channel.title: Projects on Ravpreet's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Ravpreet's Website

item.title: Host your Django webapp on Amazon Lightsail
item.description: In this project Blog I will demonstrate how a developer with minimal cloud knowledge can deploy their apps on AWS cloud using Amazon lightsail service

item.title: Monitor your linux server using python scripts
item.description: In this project we will discuss how one can leverage the python’s extensive OS, Shutil, Psutil libraries and monitor their linux server.
